# --description-- Add the `height` property with the value `600px` to your `.canvas` rule. # --hints-- You should set the `height` property to `600px`. ```js const hasHeight = new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getCSSRules().some(x => x.style.height === '600px'); assert(hasHeight); ``` Your `.canvas` element should have a `height` of `600px`. ```js const canvasHeight = new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyle('.canvas')?.getPropertyValue('height'); assert(canvasHeight === '600px'); ``` # --seed-- ## --seed-contents-- ```css .canvas { width: 500px; --fcc-editable-region-- --fcc-editable-region-- } ``` ```html Rothko Painting
```
